name: Vine and Void
description:
Journey to find the mega seed and save the world from a gloomy storm. Talk to the world's colourful inhabitants and get to know the people that you're trying to help. Explore the procedural worlds at your own pace, and chill to relaxing beats. 

It isn't about saving the world; it's about the people you meet and places you visit along the way.

Art + Programming + Writing: JUSTCAMH
Music + Sounds: ClockMaker

Check out the amazing OST!

Game made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours, loosely based off the theme 'Keep it Alive'.
